input.sentences: i decided today was a great day to get out and get some sun .
got to the beach and it could n't be more perfect .
down the shore | you could see people everywhere . apparently they had the same idea as me today .
went down to the pier to gaze out at the sun as the day grew on .
finally saw a small boat before i left that had a few friends in it i knew from back in the day .
output.sentences: The sun was out and he decided to enjoy the day.
The people on the shore had the right idea.
The sun was setting behind the pier as the beams of light grew across the horizon.
He finally had to leave his family and friends.
